title: Secondhand Shoes
description: The shoes didn’t fit. It was an omen.Eighteen year old, psychic-medium-germ-a-phobe Lila should have listened to her ghostly Gram’s advice the morning of her wedding, “Take off that dress and those shoes. And run.” En route to the honeymoon destination, she decides to listen after two too many disagreements with her groom. It doesn’t always pay to go along to make everyone else happy. Still in her wedding dress and shoes, she escapes out a diner’s bathroom window into the Florida woods with her dead Gram’s direction. So she begins a journey of finding her inner strength, putting her on deadly run for her life from her groom and his creepy friends. Will she ever get past her fear of germs and snakes? Will she survive the honeymoon?
author: Shelly Arkon
